greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n,k) equals the number of semistandard Young tableaux with shape of a partition of n and maximal element <= k.
comment: Maximal element can be any integer, but is chosen here to be <=n.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 1..44, flattened
example: For n=3 and k=2 the SSYT are
mathematica: hooklength[(p_)?PartitionQ] := Block[{ferr = (PadLeft[1 + 0*Range[#1], Max[p]] &) /@ p}, DeleteCases[(Rest[FoldList[Plus, 0, #1]] &) /@ ferr + Reverse /@ Reverse[Transpose[(Rest[FoldList[Plus, 0, #1]] &) /@ Reverse[Reverse /@ Transpose[ferr]]]], 0, -1] - 1];
content[(p_)?PartitionQ]:= Block[{le= Max[p], ferr =(PadLeft[1+ 0*Range[#1], Max[p]]&) /@ p}, DeleteCases[ MapIndexed[-le+ Range[le,1,-1]- #1- Tr[#2]&, 0*ferr]*ferr,0,-1]+ le];
results.author: _Wouter Meeussen_, Jun 12 2011
